title: Rate of inflation in Belgium 2018 to 2020
summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
Month Nov '18 has the highest Year on year percentage change and Nov '19 has the lowest Year on year percentage change.
The maximum Month Nov '18 has got 7.13 times higher Year on year percentage change than the minimum Month Nov '19.
min_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Year on year percentage change 2.78 is found at Month Nov '18 and the minimum is found at Nov '19 where Month is 0.39.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Year on year percentage change in each Month on the y axis.
Month Nov '18 has the highest Year on year percentage change and Nov '19 has the lowest Year on year percentage change.
The maximum Month Nov '18 has got 7.13 times higher Year on year percentage change than the minimum Month Nov '19.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Year on year percentage change in the y axis.
Month Nov '18 has the highest Year on year percentage change and Nov '19 has the lowest Year on year percentage change.
Second maximum Year on year percentage change is found at Month Oct '18.
Month Nov '19 has 7.13 times less Year on year percentage change than Month Nov '18 which is the highest.
The Month Nov '18 has the highest Year on year percentage change, followed by Oct '18, and Sep '18. Down to the Month Nov '19 which is the lowest.
The Year on year percentage change has risen over the past 25 Months.
Month Apr '19, and Jun '18 have the same Year on year percentage change.
The Month Nov '19 has 1.6 times less Year on year percentage change than average.
